sense.def:
A ship
je plovilo, ki prevaža potnike ali tovor.

seg.quote: The ship was due to sail the following morning.
They were sent home by ship.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje ali stvari
are shipped somewhere
, jih z ladjo ali drugim prevoznim sredstvom nekam pošljejo.

seg.quote: They had their luggage shipped to Nigeria.
